          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto és műhelye: A ferences erények allegóriája, 1310 k. Assisi, San Francesco, alsó templom, négyezet, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto and his workplace: The allegory of the Franciscian virtues, about 1310  Assisi, San Francesco, bottom church, square , fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto und sein Arbeitsplatz: Die 
Allegorie der Franciscian Tugenden, ungefähr 1310 Assisi, San 
Francesco, untere Kirche, Quadrat, Fresko.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto et son lieu de travail : 
L'allégorie des vertus de Franciscian, environ 1310 Assisi, San
Francesco, église inférieure, place, fresque.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto e seu workplace: O allegory dos 
virtues de Franciscian, aproximadamente 1310 Assisi, San Francesco, 
igreja inferior, quadrado, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto ed il suo posto di lavoro: Il 
allegory delle virtù di Franciscian, circa 1310 Assisi, San 
Francesco, chiesa inferiore, quadrato, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto και ο εργασιακός χώρος του: Η 
αλληγορία των Franciscian αρετών, περίπου 1310 Assisi, 
SAN Francesco, κατώτατη εκκλησία, τετράγωνο, νωπογραφία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto y su lugar de trabajo: La alegoría 
de las virtudes de Franciscian, cerca de 1310 Assisi, San Francesco, 
iglesia inferior, cuadrado, fresco.</string>
          </title>
